oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hand-tinted tintype of 1st Lt. William Houston Harris, Co. I, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this hand-tinted tintype, 1st Lt. William Houston Harris, Co. I, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, of Wilson County, Tenn. wore a Richmond Depot coat. He served under Brig. Gen. Robert Hatton and fought the entire war in Virginia under Gen. Stonewall Jackson and Gen. Robert E. Lee. He was born May 6, 1830 in Gladeville, Wilson County, and died Aug. 2, 1918 in Humboldt, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Harris, William Houston
